name: Leaf Town
description:
Enjoy a first-person adventure in the archipelago of Leaf Town. Meet colorful characters, check out the local sights,  unlock upgrades, and have fun. Just, be careful at night time.

This game was made for the Great Autumn Game Jam 2021
